query:
......

We kindly ask you to review the financial statements of the companies provided above and answer the following questions based solely on the information you have seen. If the question involves content not found in the financial statements, you may ignore this part and only answer the other parts.

Please categorize the financial reports of the companies listed above by 'Cash and Cash Equivalents' into the following groups: high liquidity (over 10,000 in thousands), medium liquidity (over 5,000 and below 10,000 in thousands), low liquidity (above 3,000 and below 5,000 in thousands), and very low liquidity (3,000 and below in thousands). Place companies into the same collection for the same category and into different collections for different categories.
